item.title: ATC Transponders and Automatic Altitude Reporting Systems – Elementary and Enhanced Downlink – Reportable Parameters not required by FAR

numlitem.para: Operations do not require its use, and
Repairs are made prior to completion of next heavy maintenance visit.
Flight Control to obtain exemption from the EuroControl CFMU Duty Officer and place in item 18 of the ICAO Flight Plan.

placard.para: Placard affected Parameter "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
